feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.22.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix ping url validation by @nandi95 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1754
  • [Feature] Skip test when Public IP is in a list (#1714) by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1795
  • [Feature] Add markdown content type for gotify notification by @chiragkrishna in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1712
  • Laravel 11.33.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1796
  • Release v0.22.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1797

New Contributors

  • @chiragkrishna made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1712

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.21.6...v0.22.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.23.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Refactor manual and scheduled speedtest process by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1804
  • [Feature] Server selection for manual tests by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1763
  • [Feature] Added result url to export by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1801

What's Changed

  • [Chore] Cleaned up enums by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1800
  • [Chore] Only skip scheduled tests by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1803
  • [Bug] Added server id to start speedtest action by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1805
  • Release v0.23.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1806

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.23.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fixed service enum label by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1809
  • Release v0.23.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1810

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.23.0...v0.23.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.24.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Added result checking and running statuses by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1812
  • [Feature] Added benchmarks to results table by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1813
  • [Feature] Added healthy indicator to results by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1814
  • [Feature] Added defined config servers to dropdown by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1820

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fix Skipped Tests not marked as skipped by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1818
  • [Bug] Capture curl errors when offline by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1826
  • [Bug] Fixed high ping values not showing in charts by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1827
  • Release v0.24.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1828

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.23.1...v0.24.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.24.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] High values not showing in charts by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1832
  • [Feature] Added select speedtest server job by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1831
  • Release v0.24.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.24.0...v0.24.1
